channel.title: FictionCast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Fictioncast, the podcast. The Fictionshed team discussing past, present and future projects.

channel.itunes:summary: Fictioncast, the podcast. The Fictionshed team discussing past, present and future projects.

item.title: FictionCast 12: We’re on the radar!
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed
item.itunes:subtitle: FictionCast 12: We’re on the radar!
item.itunes:summary: Darren and Tony discuss in this episode, the current state of Star Trek: Genesis of the Borg, the new addition to the Fictionshed family, Warner Bros competition and SFX discounts

item.title: FictionCast 11: Let’s blame the man flu...
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed
item.itunes:subtitle: FictionCast 11: Let’s blame the man flu...
item.itunes:summary: Darren and Tony discuss in this episode, the current state of Star Trek: Genesis of the Borg, Novo Babylonia, and Viper Pilots.

item.title: FictionCast 10: The early days...
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed
item.itunes:subtitle: FictionCast 10: The early days...
item.itunes:summary: Darren and Tony this week discuss the new cast members of Star Trek: Genesis of the Borg, plans for ScutterCast at Dimension Jump, and how Novo Babylonia all began.

item.title: FictionCast 09: Back to sounding sweet
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed
item.itunes:subtitle: FictionCast 09: Back to sounding sweet
item.itunes:summary: Darren and Tony this week discuss ScutterCast production and a brief discussion of the progress of Star Trek: Genesis of the Borg. Apologies for last week, but the audio is back to normal this week.

item.title: FictionCast 08: Are we in a Cave?
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed
item.itunes:subtitle: FictionCast 08: Are we in a Cave?
item.itunes:summary: Darren and Tony this week discuss ScutterCast, Star Trek: Genesis of the Borg, Guildies, and everything in the Fictionshed world, from what sounds like a cave(Audio issues this week)

item.itunes:subtitle: FictionCast 07: Back as promised...
item.itunes:summary: Darren and Tony this week discuss ScutterCast, Star Trek: Genesis of the Borg, and Guildies.

item.itunes:subtitle: FictionCast 06: Ok...we know we’re slack...
item.itunes:summary: Darren and Tony discuss Novo B, ScutterCast, Star Trek: Genesis of the Borg, and We Talk 2 much.

item.itunes:subtitle: FictionCast 05: And we’re back in the room...
